mayan_timeline.state: The Table Broken, But Memory Remains
mayan_timeline.description: Before the Mayans, The Table was already broken (200 MYA). But memory of unity persisted. Humanity lived in connection to The Table, even if fragmented.

humanity_state.connection: Humanity still connected to The Table through memory
humanity_state.dark_energy: Present but not codified by humanity

what_went_wrong: The Table was already broken (200 MYA)

mayan_timeline.state: Mayans Rise - First Contact with Dark Energies
mayan_timeline.description: The Mayans rise. They build great cities. They study the stars. They map the cosmos. But in their quest for knowledge, they make contact with dark energies at plate boundaries. They see the separation. They document it. They codify it.

humanity_state.spiritual_state: Mayans begin to document spiritual contracts
humanity_state.first_contact: Mayans make contact with dark energies at plate boundaries
humanity_state.codification: Mayans begin to codify the separation

what_was_right: Their connection to cosmos was genuine
what_went_wrong: Mayans made contact with dark energies
They saw the separation and documented it
They began to codify the separation
They created the first human codification of The Original Error

mayan_timeline.description: The Mayan Classic Period. The height of their civilization. But this is when they fully codified The Original Error. They built pyramids at plate boundaries. They created calendars that tracked separation. They wrote contracts with dark energies. They turned the natural separation into a spiritual system. THIS IS WHEN THE MAYANS CREATED THE ORIGINAL ERROR.

humanity_state.mayan_peak: Classic Period - height of Mayan civilization
humanity_state.pyramids: Built at plate boundaries - anchoring separation
humanity_state.contracts: Mayans wrote spiritual contracts with dark energies
humanity_state.codification: The Original Error fully codified by Mayans

what_went_wrong: They built pyramids at plate boundaries - anchoring separation
They created calendars that tracked separation, not unity
They wrote contracts with dark energies
They turned natural separation into a spiritual system
THIS IS WHEN THE MAYANS CREATED THE ORIGINAL ERROR

mayan_timeline.state: The Error Spreads - Mayan Knowledge Spreads
mayan_timeline.description: The Mayan Classic Period collapses. But their knowledge spreads. Their codification of The Original Error spreads. Other civilizations learn from the Mayans. The error becomes embedded in human consciousness. The separation becomes normalized. The Table is forgotten.

humanity_state.knowledge_spreads: Mayan knowledge spreads to other civilizations
humanity_state.normalization: Separation becomes normalized in human consciousness
humanity_state.table_forgotten: The Table is forgotten by humanity

mayan_timeline.description: Post-Classic Period. The Mayans continue, but the error is embedded. Other civilizations adopt Mayan concepts. The separation becomes part of human spiritual systems. The Table is lost. Humanity is separated. The Original Error is complete.

humanity_state.separation: Separation becomes part of human spiritual systems
humanity_state.table_lost: The Table is lost to humanity
humanity_state.error_complete: The Original Error is complete in human consciousness

what_went_wrong: The error was embedded in human consciousness

mayan_timeline.description: Spanish conquest. The Mayans are conquered. But the error is not erased - it is amplified. New separation. New battlefields. New contracts. The error spreads to Europe. The separation becomes global. The Table is further forgotten.
what_was_right: Mayan knowledge was preserved in some form

mayan_timeline.description: Modern era. The error is embedded. Separation is normalized. But memory returns. The Table is remembered. Restoration begins. We remember Pangea. We remember unity. We remember The Table. We restore what was lost.

humanity_state.error_embedded: The error is embedded in human consciousness
humanity_state.pangea_remembered: Pangea is remembered as The Table

what_went_wrong: The Table is not yet fully restored

the_truth.pangea_was_table: Pangea was The Table - perfect unity (335 MYA)
the_truth.table_broken: The Table was broken by dark energies (200 MYA)
the_truth.memory_persisted: Memory of unity persisted (0.78 field resonance)
the_truth.humanity_connected: Humanity was still connected to The Table through memory

the_mayan_error.first_contact: Mayans made first contact with dark energies at plate boundaries
the_mayan_error.codification: Mayans codified The Original Error (250-900 CE)
how_they_did_it: They built pyramids at plate boundaries - anchoring separation
They created calendars that tracked separation, not unity
They wrote spiritual contracts with dark energies
They turned natural separation into a spiritual system
They created the first human codification of The Original Error
the_mayan_error.this_is_error: THIS IS WHEN THE MAYANS CREATED THE ORIGINAL ERROR

the_spread.knowledge_spread: Mayan knowledge spread to other civilizations
the_spread.normalization: Separation became normalized in human consciousness
the_spread.table_forgotten: The Table was forgotten by humanity

the_amplification.error_amplified: The error was amplified, not erased

the_restoration.pangea_remembered: Pangea is remembered as The Table

before_mayans.description: Before the Mayans, Man (humanity) was still connected to The Table through memory. Simple contracts. Honoring unity. No codified separation.
before_mayans.connection: Man remembered The Table, even if fragmented

mayan_rise.description: The Mayans (Man) made contact with dark energies. They saw the separation. They documented it. They began to codify it.
mayan_rise.connection: Man began to codify the separation

mayan_classic.description: The Mayans (Man) fully codified The Original Error. They built pyramids at plate boundaries. They created calendars tracking separation. They wrote contracts with dark energies. THIS IS WHEN MAN CREATED THE ORIGINAL ERROR.
mayan_classic.connection: Man created the first human codification of The Original Error

mayan_collapse.description: The Mayan knowledge spread. The error spread. Man normalized separation. Man forgot The Table.
mayan_collapse.connection: Man forgot The Table, normalized separation

post_classic.description: The error embedded in Man's consciousness. Separation normalized. The Table lost. Man separated.
post_classic.connection: Man was separated, The Table lost

spanish_conquest.description: Spanish conquest. New separation. New battlefields. Man further separated. The Table further forgotten.
spanish_conquest.connection: Man further separated, The Table further forgotten

modern_era.description: Modern era. Man remembers. The Table is remembered. Pangea is remembered. Unity is remembered. Restoration begins. Man restores what was lost.
modern_era.connection: Man remembers The Table, restoration begins

the_truth.message: The Mayans created The Original Error by codifying the separation
the_truth.how: They built pyramids at plate boundaries, created calendars tracking separation, wrote contracts with dark energies
the_truth.spread: The error spread to all humanity, normalized separation
the_truth.restoration: We remember The Table, we restore what was lost

man_separated.description: The error embedded in Man's consciousness. Separation normalized. The Table lost. Man separated.
